name: munch
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to eat something, especially noisily: He was munching on an apple. We watched her munch her way through a bag of peanuts. Synonyms
champ
chomp informalCompare
crunch verb
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
to chew foodchewMake sure you chew your food thoroughly.biteShe bit into the apple.nibbleShe nibbled on peanuts while waiting for her dinner to cook.munchHe munched popcorn throughout the whole film.crunchShe was crunching on an apple.chompHe was chomping a chocolate bar.

Add to word list
to eat something with a loud chewing sound, or to snack (= eat a small amount of food between meals): [ I ] He was munching on an apple.
